tool_description: Unlimited automatic translation service. More than 99 languages available
name: AI-translate
title: AI-translate

api_list.name: Translate
api_list.description: To make translate you need to make a POST call

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description:
- Target language to translate. (**en**)
or
- Source and Target language. (**it-en**)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-translate1.p.rapidapi.com/en"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-translate1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-translate1.p.rapidapi.com/{lang}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-translate1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get list of languages
api_list.description: To get languages list you need to make a POST call:
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-translate1.p.rapidapi.com/lang/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-translate1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
